text: Police arrested a suspect in Berlin on Monday after an attack near the station.
An earthquake struck near Istanbul causing damage in several districts.
Leaders signed a new agreement in Geneva to reduce tariffs.
Officials said an explosion killed three people in a factory in Texas.
The government detained two activists in the capital after protests.
A wildfire spread in California and forced evacuations on Tuesday.
The company signed a deal with a major bank in London.
An armed group attacked a convoy in Mali according to local reports.
Floods in India left thousands displaced after heavy rains.
Authorities said the suspect was arrested in Paris after the incident.
